com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.data_services

Interface IManagementDbService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUnderlyingService

    public interface IManagementDbService
extends IUnderlyingService
    The interface to the management database
    Author:
    acp

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> ICrudService<T> getAnalyticBucketTriggerState(Class<T> trigger_state_clazz)
      This datastore contains information needed to determine when analytic jobs and buckets should be triggered
      <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketAnalyticThreadState(Class<T> clazz, DataBucketBean bucket, Optional<String> collection)
      Gets or (lazily) creates a repository accessible from processing that occurs in the context of the specified analytic thread (that is part of a bucket)
      <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketDeletionQueue(Class<T> deletion_queue_clazz)
      When a bucket is deleted (or purged), it is added to this queue, which is responsible for actual deletion of data

      Gets or (lazily) creates a repository accessible from processing that occurs in the context of the specified bucket (enrichment stage)

      This queue contains all buckets currently being tested

    • Field Detail

      • CORE_MANAGEMENT_DB

        static final Optional<String> CORE_MANAGEMENT_DB

    • Method Detail

      • readOnlyVersion

        IManagementDbService readOnlyVersion()
        Returns a version of the DB that (if supported) cannot be written to. This enables the underlying infrastructure to be more lightweight in terms of the infrastructure set up, so is desirable to use whenever possible
        Returns:
        A possibly read only version of the DB (guaranteed read only for the core management service)

      • getSharedLibraryStore

        IManagementCrudService<SharedLibraryBean> getSharedLibraryStore()
        Gets the store of shared JVM JAR libraries
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the shared libraries store

      • getPerLibraryState

        <T> ICrudService<T> getPerLibraryState(Class<T> clazz,
                                       SharedLibraryBean library,
                                       Optional<String> collection)
        Gets or (lazily) creates a repository shared by all users of the specified library (eg Harvest Technology)
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the bean or object type desired (needed so the repo can reason about the type when deciding on optimizations etc)
        library - a partial bean with the name or _id set
        collection - - arbitrary string, enables the user to split the per library state into multiple independent collections. If empty returns a read-only CRUD service of type AssetStateDirectoryBean.
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the per library generic object store

      • getDataBucketStore

        IManagementCrudService<DataBucketBean> getDataBucketStore()
        Gets the store of data buckets
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the bucket store

      • getDataBucketStatusStore

        IManagementCrudService<DataBucketStatusBean> getDataBucketStatusStore()
        Gets the store of data bucket statuses
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the bucket status store

      • getBucketHarvestState

        <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketHarvestState(Class<T> clazz,
                                          DataBucketBean bucket,
                                          Optional<String> collection)
        Gets or (lazily) creates a repository accessible from processing that occurs in the context of the specified bucket (harvest stage)
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the bean or object type desired (needed so the repo can reason about the type when deciding on optimizations etc)
        bucket - a partial bean with the name or _id set
        collection - - arbitrary string, enables the user to split the per library state into multiple independent collections. If empty returns a read-only CRUD service of type AssetStateDirectoryBean.
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the per bucket generic object store

      • getBucketEnrichmentState

        <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketEnrichmentState(Class<T> clazz,
                                             DataBucketBean bucket,
                                             Optional<String> sub_collection)
        Gets or (lazily) creates a repository accessible from processing that occurs in the context of the specified bucket (enrichment stage)
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the bean or object type desired (needed so the repo can reason about the type when deciding on optimizations etc)
        bucket - a partial bean with the name or _id set
        sub_collection - - arbitrary string, enables the user to split the per library state into multiple independent collections. If empty returns a read-only CRUD service of type AssetStateDirectoryBean.
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the per bucket generic object store

      • purgeBucket

        FutureUtils.ManagementFuture<Boolean> purgeBucket(DataBucketBean to_purge,
                                                  Optional<Duration> in)
        Purges the specified bucket of all of its data objects (and ditto for all of its sub-buckets)
        Parameters:
        to_purge - - the bucket whose data objects should be deleted
        in - - an optional duration to pause before purging the bucket
        Returns:
        - whether the purge was scheduled/successful, with a management side channel

      • testBucket

        FutureUtils.ManagementFuture<Boolean> testBucket(DataBucketBean to_test,
                                                 ProcessingTestSpecBean test_spec)
        Launches a test of the specified bucket using the provided test spec
        Parameters:
        to_test - - the bucket to test
        test_spec - - the details of the test
        Returns:
        whether the test was started successfully, with a management side channel

      • getBucketAnalyticThreadState

        <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketAnalyticThreadState(Class<T> clazz,
                                                 DataBucketBean bucket,
                                                 Optional<String> collection)
        Gets or (lazily) creates a repository accessible from processing that occurs in the context of the specified analytic thread (that is part of a bucket)
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class of the bean or object type desired (needed so the repo can reason about the type when deciding on optimizations etc)
        bucket - a partial bean with the name or _id set
        collection - - arbitrary string, enables the user to split the per library state into multiple independent collections. If empty returns a read-only CRUD service of type AssetStateDirectoryBean.
        Returns:
        the CRUD service for the per analytic thread generic object store

      • getFilteredDb

        IManagementDbService getFilteredDb(Optional<AuthorizationBean> client_auth,
                                   Optional<ProjectBean> project_auth)
        Returns a copy of the management DB that is filtered based on the client (user) and project rights
        Parameters:
        authorization_fieldname - the fieldname in the bean that determines where the per-bean authorization is held
        client_auth - Optional specification of the user's access rights
        project_auth - Optional specification of the projects's access rights
        Returns:
        The filtered CRUD repo

      • getSecuredDb

        IManagementDbService getSecuredDb(AuthorizationBean client_auth)

      • getRetryStore

        <T> ICrudService<T> getRetryStore(Class<T> retry_message_clazz)
        When an internal message gets lost, it will usually end up in the retry store - regular re-attempts will then be made
        Parameters:
        retry_message_clazz - - the class of the (internal) bean containing the lost message and some metadata
        Returns:
        a CRUD service from the underlying technology

      • getBucketDeletionQueue

        <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketDeletionQueue(Class<T> deletion_queue_clazz)
        When a bucket is deleted (or purged), it is added to this queue, which is responsible for actual deletion of data
        Parameters:
        deletion_queue_clazz - - the class of the (internal) bean containing the bucket to be deleted and some metadata
        Returns:
        a CRUD service from the underlying technology

      • getBucketTestQueue

        <T> ICrudService<T> getBucketTestQueue(Class<T> test_queue_clazz)
        This queue contains all buckets currently being tested
        Parameters:
        test_queue_clazz - - the class of the (internal) bean containing the bucket to be tested and some metadata
        Returns:
        a CRUD service from the underlying technology

      • getAnalyticBucketTriggerState

        <T> ICrudService<T> getAnalyticBucketTriggerState(Class<T> trigger_state_clazz)
        This datastore contains information needed to determine when analytic jobs and buckets should be triggered
        Parameters:
        trigger_state_clazz - - the class of the (internal) bean containing the job's trigger details
        Returns:
        a CRUD service from the underlying technology

      • getStateDirectory

        ICrudService<AssetStateDirectoryBean> getStateDirectory(Optional<DataBucketBean> bucket_filter,
                                                        Optional<AssetStateDirectoryBean.StateDirectoryType> type_filter)
        Returns a list of all the "user" state objects
        Parameters:
        bucket_filter - - if enabled then only returns CRUD datastores for the designated buckets
        type_filter - - if enabled then only returns CRUD datastores for the designated type (harvest/analytic_thread/enrichment/library)
        Returns:
        the implementation of the CRUD service
